Text: I want to know what the meaning of Games PC, that's for Computer or what, cauz some Games PC i download from this torrent but it's not working for me, Pleaz...... some one can tell me?
Yes, symbol PC meaning personal computer (with operating system Windows, Vista...). Some games are for different platforms:  Xbox 360, Wii, PS3, PS2, PSP, DS. Are not for PC!
